item.description:
First off, sorry for the late notice on this.

Next long story short, we do not have the classroom at Lesley/The Porter Exchange this week. So in lieu of our usual, your organizers have a planned some alternate excitement. An Incubator Social!!! Complete with ice cream!

We'll be meeting at 7:30 right out side Davis Square T station in the open area in front of J.P. Licks. Then we'll grab some ice cream, chillax, and even do some improv in the fresh air!!

Around 8:30 we'll walk the whopping two minutes over to Sacco's Bowl Haven: a quaint, family owned old school candlepin bowling alley!!! No worries if you have never been candlepin bowling before, it's not like regular bowling, you'll learn, and get the swing of things.

We'll play a couple of games and with this weeks donation money, we'll order some pizzas for you all to munch down on!

Here's a link to a coupon for a free shoe rental on the their website. Print it out!
http://www.saccosbowl...

And it's a mere $3 a game which is petty cash compared to most the bowling alleys in the area.

I hope to see you all there. And def come out even if you don't want to go bowling. This night's all about relaxing and having a good time. And feel free to meet us over at Sacco's too. Day street is right across the street from JP Licks, a block or two left of Somerville theater.

Remember it's your leader extraordinaire, Barbara's, last few days in Boston, so come out and give her a good send off.

No worries though, she'll be back to visit.

Rock on! and out everyone!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the goofy looking bloke.
item.name: !!! Incubator Social !!! Candelpin Bowling at Sacco's Bowl Haven in Davis Square
